```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, results = FALSE}
library(meetupr)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

a <- data.frame(get_events("Joburg-R-Users-Group",event_status = c("past", "upcoming")))
b <- data.frame(get_events("rladies-johannesburg",event_status = c("past", "upcoming")))
```

# Our R Events

## Past and Upcoming Events
```{r, echo = FALSE}
a %>% 
  add_column(event_type = "Johannesburg R User Group" ) %>% 
  select(event_type, name, time, venue_name, venue_city, link) %>% 
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))

b %>% 
  add_column(event_type = "Johannesburg R Ladies" ) %>% 
  select(event_type, name, time, venue_name, venue_city, link) %>% 
  kable() %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive"))
```
